3. ISTU KUR uruKÙ. BABBAR-ti lúMUNABTUM EGI R-pa piy anna L ra
abl. nom. prev. inf. neg. adv.
Hatti fugitive back to give not right
`a fugitiv e is not right to giv e back (= to be given back) from Hatti' (KBo V 4 Obv. 38)
